name: OcUK Forum - XENminimal
description: A green and grey polished minimal theme for OcUK xenforo forums. Pixel perfect.

user.name: Sean Mayes

additional_info:
Install, enjoy.

Update: All animations removed.
Update 2: Stripes to message box.
Update 3: Padding to close button on jumplist, and more jumplist fixes
Update god knows: Show only OP resize and position fix.
Update: Show only OP tweaks, title only appears on mouse over.
Update: New logo
